title: Flairon
info: The Flairon is a Hardmode melee weapon that auto-fires a ball-and-chain that is shaped like a Duke Fishron head about 25 tiles from the player, and releases homing bubble projectiles that damage enemies. The Flairon has a 20*1/5 (20%) chance of being dropped by Duke Fishron.
stat:
